text: Chuck Gray is an American politician. He has been the Secretary of State of Wyoming since 2023. Gray was a member of the Wyoming House of Representatives representing the 57th District from 2017 to 2023. He is a strong supporter of former President Donald Trump. ==References== Category:Living people Category:People from Casper, Wyoming Category:Politicians from Wyoming Category:State legislators of the United States Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Chuck Gray (Wyoming politician)
